entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Identity SignInManager don't check SupportsUserLockout #37575
  • WebAssembly in .Net 6 RC2: The top level app must directly references to the assemblies used by it's referenced assemblies #37574
  • Blazor WASM with LazyLoad - Cannot publish web project in RC2 #37570
  • Razor compiler does not generate C# for partial @using directives #37568
  • Debugging Blazor Webassembly running in a dev container #37565
  • Windows auth template doesn't include Kestrel auth components #37556
  • DefaultTokenProviders don't work when having more than 2 user accounts #37555
    Discussions
  • Update IdenitityModel dependencies (in 5.x) #37553
  • id_token signature validation in OpenIdConnectHandler in case of authorization code flow #37549
  • Perf improvement: json_nodejs #37545
  • dotnet publish -c Release fail with <RunAOTCompilation>true</RunAOTCompilation> and <BlazorWebAssemblyLazyLoad #37546
    6.0.0
  • Kestrel settings are not applied if configure KestrelServerOptions in appsettings.json file #37544
  • Tracking: Add support for TagsMetadata in endpoints #37543
    6.0.0
  • Minimal APIs ServiceBase #37540
    Discussions
  • calling OnPostPrint, sometimes I got dates from model binding property, sometimes i got default dates (0001-01-01 , 00:00).1st, 3rd calls i got default dates, 2nd, 4th calls i got real dates #37539
  • Type Inference on generic razor components improvements #37569

Closed

  • Failed to launch debug adapter using .NET 5 Blazor WASM and IIS Express #36372
    Backlog
  • Faster generated headers enumeration for HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #33352
    7.0-preview1
  • Razor class library - staticwebassets folder not included after first build #37505
  • Using multiple typeparam types in a Tuple passes in the typeparam name instead of the type #20838
    7.0-preview1
  • [Razor] CSS/JS isolation in a Razor Class Library #37559
  • JSInProcessObjectReferenceExtensions.InvokeVoid should call IJSInProcessObjectReference.Invoke<IJSVoidResult> #37528
    6.0.0
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_dapper, mvc, plaintext #37495
  • Allow Blazor event propagation ( bubbling up the event ) #37517
    6.0.0
  • For Blazor wasm hosted App, ability to run server side component for some sensitive page #33691
    Backlog
  • Razor in CSS or CSS in Razor anyone? #33692
    Backlog
  • Enable multi-threaded WASM runtime #28360
    Backlog
  • Docker Compose Directory Structure Causes Bad StaticWebAssets XML File #34221
    Backlog
  • [Blazor-wasm] multi-threading support via workers. #36311
    Backlog
  • Warning when using BuildServiceProvider in top-level program #37554
  • Where is the ASP.NET Branding and Logo? #37550
  • Adding Multiple Http Policy Handlers Throws Exception in RC2 #37547
    6.0.0
  • Log message in RazorSdk will throw exception due to incorrect parameter number #37467
    6.0.0
  • Strange dotnet.*.js versioning when targeting net5.0 with 6.0 SDK #37256
    6.0.0
  • Blazor WASM perf tests are broken in perf lab #37469
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Specify the correct path for BlazorWASM project #37571
    area-mvc
  • Specify the correct path for BlazorWASM project #37567
    area-mvc
  • Backport #37532 (Pass IJSVoidResult instead of object to Invoke to indicate void result) #37566
    area-blazor
  • [Static web assets] Fixes an issue where patterns at the root were not being considered #37560
    area-blazor, feature-static-web-assets
  • Publish Windows x64/x86 checksums #37557
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #37542
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Unquarantine tests #37572
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Replace HashCodeCombiner with HashCode #37558
    7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Publish Windows x64/x86 checksums #37564
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • HTTP headers enumerator move directly to next #37538
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Support generic value tuple parameters in components #34737
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Only attempt to import blazor-hotreload.js is AspNetCore Browser tools middleware is present #37531
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Pass IJSVoidResult instead of object to Invoke to indicate void result #37532
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Bump url-parse from 1.5.1 to 1.5.3 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/signalr #37313
    area-signalr, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove FakeStartup classes #36988
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Improve project reference consistency #37338
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix multiple dictionary add in polly #37537
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.0
  • Update node js version in container #37534
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix multiple dictionary add in polly #37533
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Wait for Redis to be ready in tests #37102
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix #37340 by guarding the initial ping for SignalR #37414
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Support setting ApiParameterRoutInfo for endpoints #37470
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • `<Virtualize>` Fixing `data-fetching` when horizontal scrolling is present on table layout #37451
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove MinimalSampleFSharp.fsproj from sln #32144
    area-infrastructure
  • Only attempt to import blazor-hotreload.js is AspNetCore Browser tool… #37536
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Set the aria-invalid attribute to "true" instead of true (v2) #37523
    area-blazor, 6.0.0
